#cloud-config
apt:
  # Rewrite sources.list:
  # - To remove backports not removed from base debian image and older cloud-init version
  # - To rewrite security suite using an old syntax (not working anymore)
  sources_list: |
    deb $MIRROR $RELEASE main
    deb-src $MIRROR $RELEASE main
    deb $MIRROR $RELEASE-updates main
    deb-src $MIRROR $RELEASE-updates main
    deb $${SECURITY}debian-security $RELEASE-security main
    deb-src $${SECURITY}debian-security $RELEASE-security main
preserve_hostname: false
fqdn: ${hostname}.wazo.cloud
prefer_fqdn_over_hostname: true
disable_root: false
output : { all : '| tee -a /var/log/cloud-init-output.log' }
users:
  - name: root
    lock-passwd: false
    inactive: false
    system: false
    shell: /bin/bash
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-rsa  jenkins@jenkins
  - name: jenkins
    lock-passwd: false
    inactive: false
    system: false
    shell: /bin/bash
    sudo:
      - ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - ssh-rsa  jenkins@jenkins

ssh_pwauth: yes
chpasswd:
  expire: false
  list:
    - root:secret
runcmd:
%{ for command in additional_commands ~}
  - ${ command }
%{ endfor ~}
  - sed -i -e '/^#PermitRootLogin/s/^.*$/PermitRootLogin yes/' /etc/ssh/sshd_config
  - systemctl restart sshd.service
